sample: The picture demonstrates a mature male dressed in a blue t-shirt, preparing for his meal with some vegetables and meat in his warm family kitchen. He is probably cutting ingredients into small pieces for a mixed salad.
The picture depicts a biker dressed in an orange safety outfit and helmet, riding his blue bike on a narrow pathway with one hand raised, assuming that he is trying to get someone’s attention.
The image illustrates two people standing next to a large telescope, both looking at the wallet in the female’s hands. The woman is probably preparing cash to pay the man for the rental service.
In this image, a group of five people are kneeling in front of a mature man dressed in a black suit with one hand raised. They are probably seeking his help with something important.
The picture demonstrates a woman dressed in warm blue clothes, with her both hands in jacket pockets, standing in the snowy setting. She is probably on the university campus for the winter semester.

In this photo, a mature woman dressed in a black sleeveless t-shirt, is wearing headphones and holding a mobile phone in her left hand while walking on a crowded pathway, assuming that she is either checking messages or looking for her favorite song.

The photo illustrates many people in the outdoor area of a modern building engaging in various activities such as walking dogs, taking a walk or simply enjoying the view. They are probably university students relaxing on campus after their classes.
